com.orchestranetworks.ui
Interface UIRequestContext

All Superinterfaces:
UIContext
public interface UIRequestContext
extends UIContext

Encapsulates an HTTP request so that a bean editor can provide the user input validation context.

See Also:
UIBeanEditor
